```
mutating func decodePredicateExpression<each Input, Output>(
    input: repeat (each Input).Type,
    output: Output.Type,
    predicateConfiguration: PredicateCodableConfiguration
) throws -> (expression: any PredicateExpression<Output>, variable: (repeat PredicateExpressions.Variable<each Input>))
```
